titles.title: SF246 He came to earth in poverty,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He came to earth in poverty,
a child uniquely holy,
forsaking heaven's majesty
to live among the lowly:
Emmanuel means God has come,
a child of human birth --
and here with us he made his home,
the Son of God on earth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
A servant toiling with his hands,
his sovereignty concealing,
our daily lives he understands
with perfect fellow-feeling:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In meek obedience stooping down
to taste humiliation,
he freely took a thorny crown
for reconciliation:

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Emmanuel! Our God is near,
our every sorrow sharing:
he knows our feelings -- he is here,
our human frailty bearing:
